title: Trying to change to name but server change isn't in my store ?
body: Does anyone know why it is not in my store? I can see the change regionsome thing if anyone knows about this letter me know â˜º

replies.body:
Sincerest apologies for the late reply! Server transfers are disabled until November 21, as mentioned in this post:
> TL;DR - From the beginning of patch 7.18 (tomorrow morning, 14th Sep), transfers from OCE to other regions will need to be disabled until November 21st as we launch Emotes and then prepare for preseason. For the first month, you may still transfer by submitting a ticket to support. Read on for details.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/f6bvYNQx-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st

Summoner Name Changes should still be available in the store, however. Please don't hesitate to follow up if you have any additional questions or concerns!
